subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: You could almost taste the hunger as Bayern Munich, twice-beaten finalists of the Champions League, finally broke through and won the title with a 2-1 victory over Borussia Dortmund.
snippet: You could almost taste the hunger as Bayern Munich, twice-beaten finalists of the Champions League, finally broke through and won the title with a 2-1 victory over Borussia Dortmund.
